con:part.con:content: <wsdl:definitions name="MisterDiscountService" targetNamespace="http://informatique.polytech.unice.fr/soa1/MisterDiscount" xmlns:xsd="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:wsdl="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/" xmlns:tns="http://informatique.polytech.unice.fr/soa1/MisterDiscount" xmlns:soap="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/wsdl/soap/" xmlns:ns1="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"> <wsdl:types> <xs:schema elementFormDefault="unqualified" targetNamespace="http://informatique.polytech.unice.fr/soa1/MisterDiscount" version="1.0" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema"> <xs:element name="consultingOrder" type="tns:consultingOrder"/> <xs:element name="consultingOrderResponse" type="tns:consultingOrderResponse"/> <xs:element name="createOrder" type="tns:createOrder"/> <xs:element name="createOrderResponse" type="tns:createOrderResponse"/> <xs:element name="product" type="tns:product"/> <xs:element name="registerCatalog" type="tns:registerCatalog"/> <xs:element name="registerCatalogResponse" type="tns:registerCatalogResponse"/> <xs:element name="startDeliveryCatalog" type="tns:startDeliveryCatalog"/> <xs:element name="startDeliveryCatalogResponse" type="tns:startDeliveryCatalogResponse"/> <xs:element name="startPrinting" type="tns:startPrinting"/> <xs:element name="startPrintingResponse" type="tns:startPrintingResponse"/> <xs:complexType name="createOrder"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="arg0" type="tns:createOrderInput"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="createOrderInput"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="cardNumber" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="city_name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="country_id" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="productsId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="street_name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="zip_code" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="createOrderResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="receipt" type="tns:createOrderOutput"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="createOrderOutput"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="cost" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="eta" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="orderId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="paymentStatus" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="products"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="product" type="tns:product"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="product"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="price" type="xs:int"/> <xs:element name="product_id" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="quantity" type="xs:int"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="startDeliveryCatalog"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="arg0" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="startDeliveryCatalogResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="succeed" type="xs:boolean"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="startPrinting"> <xs:sequence/> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="startPrintingResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="succeed" type="xs:boolean"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="consultingOrder"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="arg0" type="tns:consultOrderInput"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="consultOrderInput"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="name" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="orderId" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="consultingOrderResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="order" type="tns:consultOrderOutput"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="consultOrderOutput"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="cost" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="eta" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="orderId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="products"> <xs:complexType> <xs:sequence> <xs:element maxOccurs="unbounded" name="product" type="tns:product"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:element> <xs:element name="shippingStatus" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="trackingNumber" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="registerCatalog"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element minOccurs="0" name="arg0" type="tns:address"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="address"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="cityName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="countryId" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="streetName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="userName" type="xs:string"/> <xs:element name="zipCode" type="xs:string"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> <xs:complexType name="registerCatalogResponse"> <xs:sequence> <xs:element name="succeed" type="xs:boolean"/> </xs:sequence> </xs:complexType> </xs:schema> </wsdl:types> <wsdl:message name="createOrder"> <wsdl:part element="tns:createOrder" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="registerCatalogResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:registerCatalogResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="consultingOrder"> <wsdl:part element="tns:consultingOrder" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="startPrintingResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:startPrintingResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="createOrderResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:createOrderResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="startDeliveryCatalog"> <wsdl:part element="tns:startDeliveryCatalog" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="startPrinting"> <wsdl:part element="tns:startPrinting" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="startDeliveryCatalogResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:startDeliveryCatalogResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="registerCatalog"> <wsdl:part element="tns:registerCatalog" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:message name="consultingOrderResponse"> <wsdl:part element="tns:consultingOrderResponse" name="parameters"></wsdl:part> </wsdl:message> <wsdl:portType name="MisterDiscount"> <wsdl:operation name="createOrder"> <wsdl:input message="tns:createOrder" name="createOrder"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:createOrderResponse" name="createOrderResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="startDeliveryCatalog"> <wsdl:input message="tns:startDeliveryCatalog" name="startDeliveryCatalog"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:startDeliveryCatalogResponse" name="startDeliveryCatalogResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="startPrinting"> <wsdl:input message="tns:startPrinting" name="startPrinting"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:startPrintingResponse" name="startPrintingResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="consultingOrder"> <wsdl:input message="tns:consultingOrder" name="consultingOrder"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:consultingOrderResponse" name="consultingOrderResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="registerCatalog"> <wsdl:input message="tns:registerCatalog" name="registerCatalog"></wsdl:input> <wsdl:output message="tns:registerCatalogResponse" name="registerCatalogResponse"></wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:portType> <wsdl:binding name="MisterDiscountServiceSoapBinding" type="tns:MisterDiscount"> <soap:binding style="document" transport="http://schemas.xmlsoap.org/soap/http"/> <wsdl:operation name="createOrder"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="createOrder"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="createOrderResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="startDeliveryCatalog"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="startDeliveryCatalog"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="startDeliveryCatalogResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="startPrinting"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="startPrinting"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="startPrintingResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="consultingOrder"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="consultingOrder"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="consultingOrderResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> <wsdl:operation name="registerCatalog"> <soap:operation soapAction="" style="document"/> <wsdl:input name="registerCatalog"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:input> <wsdl:output name="registerCatalogResponse"> <soap:body use="literal"/> </wsdl:output> </wsdl:operation> </wsdl:binding> <wsdl:service name="MisterDiscountService"> <wsdl:port binding="tns:MisterDiscountServiceSoapBinding" name="MisterDiscountPort"> <soap:address location="http://localhost:8081/MisterDiscount"/> </wsdl:port> </wsdl:service> </wsdl:definitions>
